channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: The death of ‘perfect’ photos? Why 2026’s major new cameras are wildly retro
item.description: There have been three major camera launches in 2026 so far; two pricey black-and-white-only compact cameras and a Super 8-style Instax…that also shoots video. Niche is an understatement. Is this a sign of things to come?
